div.p: This Resource covers data about persons and animals involved in a wide range of health-related activities, including:

ul.li: Tracking of personal health and exercise data

div.p: The data in the Resource covers the "who" information about the patient: its attributes are focused on the demographic information necessary to support the administrative, financial and logistic procedures. A Patient record is generally created and maintained by each organization providing care for a patient. A person or animal receiving care at multiple organizations may therefore have its information present in multiple Patient Resources.
